div.p: We Are A Free, Public Charter School Offering Integrated Arts And Core Academic Learning.

div.div: Download the Student Handbook and link to all the information you need for a great start to the school year!
After school enrichment classes are now open for Fall 2017 registration! EKC welcomes all K-12 students in our community!

div.p: A K-8 public charter school with an arts integration approach to education.

The Capitol Encore Academy will develop artists who inspire others with principles of design and artful thinking through the integration of academic excellence, virtuous character and disciplined artistry.

div.p: Our teachers are saving lives in AND out of the classroom! Ms. Hunter was featured on ABC11 for her heroic efforts, saving a choking student using the Heimlich maneuver!

button.span: Click Here to Leave a Review and Help Us Grow!

p.span:
10 books left! LAST ORDER! A sneak peek at this year’s yearbook design template! If you still would like to purchase email me at brian.kline@capitolencoreacademy.org with your name, students name and grade. Books are $20 a piece. Yearbooks will be in by June.
Thanks everyone! Be safe!

Happy Spring Break to our families! Keep practicing social distancing and wash those hands chameleons!
Please share and let all your friends know. www.capitolencoreacademy.org/enrollment-information/

div.h6: After School Programming and Latch Key

p.span: Such a great school, my son is excelling here. Thanks to all the amazing teachers!
I love the way they integrate the common core curriculum into the arts. My daughter is thriving, challenged, and loves to learn.

div.div: School tours are held on the 3rd Thursday of every month at 1:30pm. If you would like to register for a tour, please complete the form here.
